nostr.nsec.comment: The nsec for the user that will be making the zaps
nostr.relays.comment: The list of relays to use

lnd.address.comment: The IP address or FQDN to communicate with the LND server over REST
lnd.port.comment: The port the LND server is listening on for REST
lnd.macaroon.comment: The macaroon for authentication and authorization for the LND server in hex format
lnd.paymentTimeout.comment: Time permitted in seconds to complete a payment or expire it
lnd.feeLimit.comment: Fee limit, in sats, allowed for each payment made
lnd.connectTimeout.comment: Time permitted in seconds to connect to LND
lnd.readTimeout.comment: Time permitted in seconds to read all data from LND
lnd.activeServer.comment: Indicates the name of a nested LND server configuration to use. This permits quickly changing between configurations
lnd.servers.comment: An array of LND server configurations. Each is expected to have the same fields as described above

lnurl.connectTimeout.comment: Time permitted in seconds to connect to LN URL Providers
lnurl.readTimeout.comment: Time permitted in seconds to read all data from LN URL Providers
lnurl.denyProviders.comment: Domains for which zaps will not be paid
